headline: Schlumberger (SLB) Q1 Earnings on the Horizon: Analysts' Insights on Key Performance Measures

headline: Here are Ariel Appreciation Fund’s Updates on its New Addition Schlumberger NV (SLB)
summary: Ariel Investments, an investment management company, released its “Ariel Appreciation Fund” first-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. In the first quarter, investors fled to shelter as hopes for another year of U.S. outperformance, driven by economic momentum and the new administration’s pro-business approach swiftly gave way to tariff fears […]
